TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentDesignerStateService

summary.span: 允許設計工具儲存及擷取其狀態。

span.span: Allows a designer to store and retrieve its state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具狀態是由與設計工具相關聯的元件做為索引鍵。Designer state is keyed by the component with which the designer is associated. Web Form 設計介面會提供此服務和元件設計工具使用服務。The Web Forms design surface offers this service and component designers use the service. 這是選擇性的主機服務，且控制項設計工具不應該假設一定會提供。This is an optional host service, and control designers should not assume it will always be provided. 設計工具狀態被以一組的字典格式的名稱/值組。Designer state is represented as a set of name/value pairs, in the form of a dictionary. 字典中儲存的值必須是可序列化。Values stored in the dictionary must be serializable. 指定的元件應該位於設計工具，且必須有非空白的名稱。The specified component should be sited in the designer and should have a non-empty name. > [!CAUTION] > 不要儲存機密資訊。Do not store sensitive information to the . 機密資訊會包含密碼和驗證資料或任何您不想要公開給不必要的來源的資料。Sensitive information includes password and authentication data, or any data you do not want to expose to an unwanted source.

span.span: Gets a state item specified by the key for the given component.

returns.span: 所指定之 的設計工具狀態。

span.span: The designer state for specified by .
